item.title: Register Owshen
item.content:encoded:
caution

Need Ubuntu 22.04 or higher

Install Dependenciesâ€‹

sudo apt update && sudo apt install libfuse2

Install Owshenâ€‹

wget -O owshen https://github.com/OwshenNetwork/owshen/releases/download/v0.1.0/Owshen_v0.1.0_x86_64.AppImage; chmod +x owshen
mv owshen /usr/local/bin 
owshen --version

Init Walletâ€‹

owshen init

Save Mnemonic Pharse!!!â€‹

Check Wallet Addressâ€‹

owshen info

Registerâ€‹

  1. Follow Owshen Twitter
  2. Retweet + Like THIS POST
  3. Comment your wallet address

Check web walletâ€‹

  1. Run this
owshen wallet
  1. Open http://127.0.0.1:9000 in your browser

item.title: Web Mint
item.content:encoded: English Coming Soonâ€‹

item.title: First Step to join Permaweb with ArDrive & ArNS
item.content:encoded:
What you needâ€‹

  • Wallet
  • $AR, you can get it from your favorite CEX

Upload to ArDriveâ€‹

  • Visit https://app.ardrive.io
  • Login with ArConnect
  • Create a public Drive
  • Then upload your file, you can upload image, video, text file, anything! ( Under 500Kb file size are FREE )
  • Click your file and go to details section, then copy the Data Tx ID

Buy your ArNSâ€‹

To buy ArnS you need to have TestIO Token, here's how to request the tokenâ€‹

  • Go to Ar.io Discord
    • In the #arns-test channel type /apply, answer all questions
    • For this question, answer with your Tx ID from previous Step

After receiving Test IOâ€‹

  • Go to https://arns.app
  • Find your name ( 8 digit++ )
  • If it's available, click register now
  • Choose 1 Year
  • Fill the Arweave transaction ID ( Target ID ) with your Tx ID

And now you can access your ArNS with https://your-arNS.ar-io.dev.

Example https://megumii.ar-io.dev

ar-io.dev can be changed to any Gateways that listed here - > https://gateways.ar-io.devâ€‹

Example:

  • https://megumii.blessingway.xyz
  • https://megumii.g8way.io
  • https://megumii.dwentz.xyz
  • https://megumii.sulapan.com
  • https://megumii.66666.site

Official Guideâ€‹

Wanna create a Permanent website? Check this out https://permasite.arweave.dev/â€‹

Last, please STAMPâ€‹

  • Go to Bazar
  • Click it, no need any gas fees

item.title: Penumbra Summoning Ceremony
item.content:encoded:
Install Dependenciesâ€‹

  • any other
sudo apt-get install build-essential pkg-config libssl-dev clang git-lfs screen
  • rustup
curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh

Install pcliâ€‹

git clone https://github.com/penumbra-zone/penumbra
cd penumbra && git fetch && git checkout v0.63.1
cargo build --release --bin pcli

Generate/Import walletâ€‹

  • Generate Wallet
  • Import Wallet
cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli init soft-kms generate
cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli init soft-kms import-phrase

Faucetâ€‹

  • View address
cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli view address 0
  • Request Faucet, Discord

Check balanceâ€‹

cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli view sync
cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli view balance

Contributeâ€‹

screen -S penumbra
cargo run --quiet --release --bin pcli -- ceremony contribute --phase 1 --bid 60penumbra --coordinator-address penumbra1qvqr8cvqyf4pwrl6svw9kj8eypf3fuunrcs83m30zxh57y2ytk94gygmtq5k82cjdq9y3mlaa3fwctwpdjr6fxnwuzrsy4ezm0u2tqpzw0sed82shzcr42sju55en26mavjnw4
info
  • The minimum bid for this ceremony is 60penumbra.
  • To change your bid, you can simply run the command again with a different bid amount. Note that each time you bid with the command above, this adds additional funds to all of the previous bids you've already submitted.

Output:

                               â›”ï¸WARNINGï¸ï¸â›”ï¸:

                        you are about to lose money!

ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥

... we considered ourselves to be a fault-tolerant distributed system...
This message is a warning about danger.
The danger is in a particular location... the center of danger is the pcli binary...
The danger is to your funds, and it can destroy them.
The danger is unleashed only if you execute this software.
